channel.title: reefing – Doug and Ruth.com
channel.description: Life, presented as though it were a series of vacations and parties.

item.title: Beringer Bowl 2013
item.dc:creator: Doug
item.description: Team Tyrannicide gets 3rd place in cruising class, arriving in Provencetown at 12:55 AM. Bonus video! [tube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rD_vWU5039Q[/tube] John Discloses Winning Strategy [tube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wi82w2ql5sI[/tube] Whales on the Return Trip
item.content:encoded:
Team Tyrannicide gets 3rd place in cruising class, arriving in Provencetown at 12:55 AM.

[See image gallery at localhost]
